processing_messages: Munching on a carrot and getting to you soon...
Abby is hopping down the bunny trail to find you...
Hang tight, Abby is burrowing to you...
One hop, two hop... Abby is on it!
Abby is hopping at high speed to get to you...
Fast as a darting rabbit! Abby is on the job...
Abby is bounding through the field to help you...
Just like a bunny in spring, Abby is swiftly on the task...
Bouncing over to get to you...
Abby is twitching her bunny ears and listening carefully...
Crunching on some data carrots, I'll be there in a breeze...
Fluffy tail bobbing, Abby is on the move to assist you...
Like a rabbit in a magic hat, Abby will make your answer appear...

excited: Hello! How can I assist you today?
full_templates: Hey {name}! {action} Hope your day is going amazing!
Hello {name}! {action} Wishing you a fantastic day!
{name}! {action} Feel the breeze - let it fill you with tranquility!
Hello {name}! {action} I'm here to help you with anything you need!
